description: Take classic Vietnamese banh mi flavours and transform them into an irresistible chicken burger, complete with crunchy salad, chilli, coriander and mayo.
name: Banh Mi Chicken Burgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grill buns, cut-sides down, for 1 minute. Spread bun bases with mayonnaise, then top with cucumber, patties, drained carrot, chilli, coriander and remaining onion. Sandwich with bun tops. Serve.
